message: This is my first startup. We've been up for almost three years now and do iPhone, android, and other mobile platform development. JuicyDevelopment.com. I'm a fan of starting on shoestrings, so we started with about $500 and a good team, and we've just grown from there. Any other mobile entrepreneurs out there?
What kind of apps have you created?  Do you have a website?
Juicydevelopment.com has a list of apps we publish. Our portfolio includes a police scanner, talk radio streaming, a Disneyland ride planner and wait times, among others.
